As a tiny wind chime: Attach small bells to the prongs of the spoon and hang it from a string to create a miniature wind chime.
As a plant label: Write the name of each plant on the spoon and use it as a label in your garden or indoor plants.
As a paperweight: Place a heavy object, like a metal washer, on the end of the spoon and use it to hold down papers.
As a hair clip: Bend the spoon into a hair clip shape and use it to hold your hair out of your face.
As a zipper pull: Attach a small magnet to the end of the spoon and use it as a zipper pull for your jacket or pants.
